subject: Enforce max chat message size (API + WS)
description: Add max length validation for incoming chat messages to prevent huge payload DoS. Update packages/web/src/app/api/v1/chat/route.ts (zod message), packages/web/src/app/api/chat/route.ts, and packages/web/src/pages/api/ws.ts message handler to reject oversized message.content with 413/400 and send error on WS.
